last_episode_to_air.name: Ane Haramix
last_episode_to_air.overview: After the death of his parents, Akitoshi lived with his older brother named Hitomi. Akitoshi apparently has a passion for his biological brother. One night, a beautiful and sexy woman appeared in Akitoshi's room. He introduces himself as the God of Death (Shinigami) named Mina. Mina comes asking for Akitoshi because it's been a long time ago. Hitomi did not accept that his sister had to die, he was willing to accept his life for his sister. Hearing that, Mina was touched and gave Akitoshi relief. If in a week Akitoshi becomes a father, then his life will be added by 10 years. Akitoshi also asked his brother for help. How?

name: Ane Haramix
overview: After the death of his parents, Akitoshi lived with his older brother named Hitomi. Akitoshi apparently has a passion for his biological brother. One night, a beautiful and sexy woman appeared in Akitoshi's room. He introduces himself as the God of Death (Shinigami) named Mina. Mina comes asking for Akitoshi because it's been a long time ago. Hitomi did not accept that his sister had to die, he was willing to accept his life for his sister. Hearing that, Mina was touched and gave Akitoshi relief. If in a week Akitoshi becomes a father, then his life will be added by 10 years. Akitoshi also asked his brother for help. How?
